summary: Adds more stuff to the breezehome, a story, a dungeon, a tressasure, new weapons! AND A LOT MORE! go and check it out.
descriptionHtml:
[IMG=center]http://i.imgur.com/WMocV.png[/IMG]
[center][b]Version 1.2[/center][/b]

[center]If you like this mod, [i]please[/i] don\'t forget to endorse; it\'s my only reward for the time and effort I spend on it![/center]


[heading]!WARNING![/heading]
This mod somehow needs bathing beauties luxary suit to run!
i dont know why, and if you know how to fix that tell me please!
MOD LINK: http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/downloads/file.php?id=11427



[heading]What Is It?:[/heading]

This mod contains an expanded version of Breezehome in Whiterun.
It basicly adds:[list]
     [*]A story to the house
     [*]A big dungeon
     [*]More rooms to the breezehome for normal use
     [*]Story NPC\'s
     [*]New enemies
[/list]
[heading]How to obtain the keys:[/heading]

When you enter Breezehome, there will be a journal to the right, near the shelves.
Read the journal and follow the instructions to obtain the key.
It is a file in the download section that tell you the location for the keys!


[center][i]NOTE
This mod is not even close to done, i will make it huge. 
It\'s just that it takes time. please be patient.[/center][/i]

[line]
This mod is only like 5% finished, I have a [i]lot[/i] of ideas.

I [i]need[/i] feedback from you guys, and I want to hear your ideas and opinions. 
I am going to be updating this mod quite often, because I\'m working a lot on it.


[heading]Installation:[/heading]

[u][b]Manual:[/b][/u]
Drag and drop \"MoreofBreeze.esp\" into your Data folder.
Data folder is located at: C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\\Data

[u][b]NNM:[/b][/u]
Add the RAR file into NNM (or download via NMM) and activate \"More of Breezehome\" in Nexus Mod Manager.


[heading]Uninstallation:[/heading]

[u][b]Manual:[/b][/u]
Delete \"MoreofBreeze.esp\" from your Data folder.

[u][b]NMM:[/b][/u]
Deactivate \"More of Breezehome\" in Nexus Mod Manager.


[heading]Version History:[/heading]
[b][u]v1.2[/u]:[/b] [list]
     [*]Added a roof
     [*]Clipping fixses
     [*]Added 1 new spell
     [*]Both spells now work
     [*]Added more decorations
     [*]Added some other stuff you can check out
[/list]

[b][u]v1.1[/u]:[/b] [list]
     [*]Lighting fixes
     [*]Clipping fixes
     [*]Grammer fixses :D
     [*]Fixed book tittles and added a name for the last owner of Breezehome
     [*]Fixed the Potion
     [*]The spell still don\'t work..
     [*]Added new stuff to the dungeon and changed the name
[/list]

[b][u]v1.0[/u]:[/b] Initial Release!


[heading]Future Plans:[/heading]
[list]
     [*]Adding a [i]lot[/i] of rooms with quests, traps, and treasures
     [*]Adding quest NPC\'s
     [*]Adding new monster NPC\'s
     [*]Adding more normal rooms to Breezehome for normal use
[/list]


[Heading]My other mods![/heading]
Check out my Spells mod: ASAP - AndSy\'s Spells and Powers!
[b][u]Link[/u]:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/21487]ASAP[/url]


[heading]Contact Me/Report a Bug:[/heading]
[u][b]Email[/u]:[/b] ameland97@gmail.com
[b][u]Nexus[/u]:[/b] [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/3672501]RedModder[/url]

Or just leave a comment here!
[line]

[heading]Special thanks to:[/heading]
TheHodoo for helping me out a lot!
[line]

[center][i]Is something missing in this description?
Do you want more info?[/i]

Tell me and i will update that as well :)

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/aSKbp.png[/IMG]
[b]Have a good day![/b][/center]
author: AndSy
